page.title: 07INDUSTRY - GREETLAND
page.content: Bondina, is situated in a valley, by a river. On one side of the hill there is a lot of housing and on the other there is the Bradley Hall Golf Club. Bondina employs j572 people, 480 of which are from the Greetland area. Bondina was founded in 1956 as a result of a partnership between a German company, Carl Freudenburg and a British Company, Bradford Dyers Association. In 1970 BDA was taken over by Carrington Vyella and Freudenburgs assumed full control and is a multi-national company with companies throughout the world. The main products are none woven clothes interlinings, abrasive products such as pan scrubbers, dish cloths and many air and liquid filters. Overall Bondina is one of the largest local factories.
